text: Horst Bergmann (24 November 1937 - 10 September 2016) was a German wrestler. He competed in the men's freestyle lightweight at the 1960 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1937 births Category:2016 deaths Category:German male sport wrestlers Category:Olympic wrestlers of the United Team of Germany Category:Wrestlers at the 1960 Summer Olympics Category:People from Nowa Sól
title: Horst Bergmann
